alert.note: Alert for Southampton; Suffolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 2:52PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL HERTFORD... NORTHWESTERN GATES...AND SOUTHEASTERN SOUTHAMPTON COUNTIES AND THE SOUTHWESTERN CITY OF SUFFOLK THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 252 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Roduco, or 10 miles northwest of Gatesville, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Suffolk around 255 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Topsy, Riddicksville, Wyanoke, Dort, and Riverdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
